hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: We need someone with experience direct to consumer advertising for prescription drugs “We are completely poleaxed: it feels as though our ship has been torpedoed,” Lloyd told me. “But it’s wonderful that someone as talented as Dean Robinson is stepping into the role from the chorus, and at least this is an opera which seems to absorb our sorrow and shock: it’s so big and compassionate, so full of mortality and community, and shot through with a sense of loss that the tragedy of losing Richard has drawn us closer together. If we were dealing with something less powerful, I think carrying on would have been unbearable.”
